label: 権少僧都
対訳語: Provisional Junior Assistant High Priest of Buddhism
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddhist official, being one of the Buddhist Hierarchy (Sōgō), who holds one of the provisional posts (gon-kan). Those Buddhist priests who held this post and are mentioned in this book are as follows, being listed in the order of their appearance in the text: Dōyū, Gennin, Hōzō, Genshin, Sentō, Kakuchō, Myōkai, and Seison. [僧綱、権官、道雄、源仁、法蔵、源信、千到、覚超、明快、成尊]
